modName: Kaling's Elegantly Slooty CBBE bodyslide preset
summary: Want to handle formal dresses, super slooty outfit and even Loli Dresses without rebuilding your body? Try this preset, you will like it.
descriptionHtml:
Want to handle[color=#0000ff] formal dresses,[/color][color=#cc0000] slooty outfit[/color], or even [color=#6aa84f]Loli dresses[/color] without rebuilding your body?
Here comes Elegantly Slooty bodyslide preset for CBBE. 
The body is slooty but yet elegant. You may never find it wield in any style of outfit. 
I have also made it quite compatible for most of the outfit, as I didn't push the body to its limit.
Highly recommended to be set at[b] [i]maximum[/i][/b] weight[color=#efefef] (adjust in menu with console command 'showracemenu')[/color] . Isn't it what you come for?

[color=#ff7700]New![/color]
version 1.2:
﻿-Sizes of belly and breast under minimum have been adjusted to provide better variation and compatibility of the body. Almost no change to body under maximum change though. 
﻿-Fix a wrong slider in ver1.1 that may break some outfits or the body itself under extreme condition. 
﻿-Smaller butt version available. It may break some extreme outfit (emmmm... Believe me, I tried.)  . Better balance for[i] minimum [/i]weight.


[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]FAQ:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][u]1. How to use:[/u][/color]
﻿ Simply load the file with NMM or MO.(Please ignore the alert, because I don't have any esp inside.) Then the preset will appear in your bodyslide.
[color=#ff00ff]
If it doesn't work:[/color]
﻿For NMM users, you should drop the xml. file under folder:
﻿ ﻿Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderPresets 
﻿For MO users, you should drop the xml. file under folder: 
﻿ ﻿Mod Organizer\mods\BodySlide and Outfit Studio\CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderPresets
﻿For[u][b] [color=#ff00ff]custom races users[/color][/b][/u], you need to build the body and drag the nif. files to replace the ones in your races' bodies.
[color=#cfe2f3]
2.Why not post the naked images of the character?[/color]
﻿Will you do that to your daughter？ 
﻿Nor will I.

[color=#ffff00]3.[/color][color=#ffff00]Where did the outfits come from?[/color]
﻿outfit involved:
﻿Youlan by _op: outfit 27 from  [url=http://http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4288367-1-1.html]http://bbs.3dmgam[/url][url=http://http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4288367-1-1.html]e.com/thread-4288367-1-1.html[/url]
﻿Apachii Divine Elegance Store: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073[/url]﻿
﻿Pure Elegance Outfit CBBE HDT BodySlide By Nokou: 
﻿[url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3890-pure-elegance-outfit-cbbe-hdt-bodyslide-by-nokou/]https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3890-pure-elegance-outfit-cbbe-hdt-bodyslide-by-nokou/[/url]
[color=#6aa84f]
4.How to make a background like the ones in image?[/color]
﻿background mods involved:
﻿Flower Fields by mobiusbelmont: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83495]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83495[/url]
﻿Dynavision by Gopher: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525[/url]

I have used this preset for a long time myself and somehow I decide to share it with you guys. 
It's also my very first file uploaded. Hope you enjoy!
author: Kaling
